alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:04PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern San Juan and eastern Kane Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 304 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Powell, or 10 miles northeast of Page, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Powell between Wahweap and Dangling Rope. This storm will be capable of producing strong gusty winds on Lake Powell. This will lead to a sudden increase in waves and very choppy waters which will result in hazardous boating conditions. Boaters are urged to seek safe harbor if possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
